\begin{minipage}{4.2truein}
                 \footnotesize
                 \parindent=0pt

In the framework of nonlinear realizations we rederive the action
of the $N=2$ SuperConformal Quantum Mechanics (SCQM). We propose also the
WZNW -- like construction of interaction term in the lagrangian with the help of
 Cartan's Omega forms.
